content: This PR proves a point-set topology lemma about continuous functions on profinite spaces (which I want as part of a long-term project to formalize the theory of p-adic measures). It's been open since Jan 26th. Could I request a review?
@Filippo A. E. Nuccio Your emoji suggests you left a review, but I don't see it. Did you forget to submit it?
No, it took longer than expected (I very much enjoyed @David Loeffler 's work, so I went for a detailed, and hopefully useful, one).
